sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NavigationEnd, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private router:Router){} adminSession:string; ngOnInit(): void { this.adminSession=sessionStorage.getItem("adminSession"); this.router.events.subscribe((event) => { if (event instanceof NavigationEnd) { this.adminSession=sessionStorage.getItem("adminSession"); } }); } logout():void{ sessionStorage.removeItem("userSession"); this.router.navigate(['/admin-login-register']) } }
